definition: to obey/to follow/to arrange/to make reasonable/along/favorable
aspect particle indicating action in progress
to make known/to show/to prove/to write/book/outstanding
to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in

sentences.english: Follow the main road until it branches, and then turn to the right.
sentences.chinese: 順著這條大路走，在路的分岔口向右拐。

sentences.english: We slid down the grassy slope.
But he sowing to the Spirit will reap life everlasting from the Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 順著聖靈撒種的，必從聖靈收永生。

sentences.english: The boat chugged along the canal.
sentences.chinese: 小船穩穩地順著運河突突地航行。

sentences.english: The big car swept up the drive to the front of the house.
sentences.chinese: 那輛大轎車穩穩地順著車道駛到房子前面。

sentences.english: Rivulets of sweat streamed down his cheeks.
sentences.chinese: 津津汗水順著他的兩頰流下。
